title: Estefania Ors' shot lifts Bengals to win over Portland State
title_page: ISU WBB: Estefania Ors' shot lifts Bengals to win over Portland State
maintext:
Estefania Ors hit the game-winning shot in Idaho State’s 58-57 win Saturday at Sacramento State.
The Bengals did not lead in the final period before Ors nailed a 3-pointer with four seconds remaining, putting the Bengals ahead 58-57. Portland State’s Ashley Bolston missed the potential game-winning shot at the buzzer.
The Bengals outscored Portland State 15-9 in the final period.
Idaho State (14-6, 9-2 Big Sky Conference) was led by Ors’ 18 points and 10 rebounds, the second double-double of her career. The junior guard was 7 of 15 from the field, including 4 of 9 on 3-pointers.
Grace Kenyon and Sai Tapasa had 13 points each. Teammate Saylair Grandon added a career-high eight assists.
The Bengals return to Reed Gym on Thursday against Northern Arizona.
